services.title: Respiratory
services.description: Acute colds, flu, sinusitis, sore throats, acute bronchitis, asthma, allergies.

services.title: Digestive system
services.description: Esophageal spasms, gastritis, inflammation of the small and large intestine, irritable bowel syndrome, constipation/diarrhea.

services.title: Musculoskeletal
services.description: Sports injuries, whiplash, tennis elbow, shoulder pain, back pain, weak/spastic paralysis, golfer's elbow.

services.title: Hormonal
services.description: Diabetes, menstrual disorders, premenstrual pain and tension (PMS).

services.title: Urinary and reproductive organs
services.description: Bedwetting, urinary tract infections, prostate hypertrophy/prostatitis, impotence, erectile problems, burning pain during urination, certain fertility issues.

services.title: Other
services.description: Exhaustion (mental and physical), sleep disorders, psychological instability, depression, nervousness, phobias, toothache, headaches, migraines, rheumatic complaints, menopausal symptoms, facial pain, fibromyalgia, RSI (repetitive strain injury), burnout, ear problems (such as tinnitus), skin problems (e.g., acne, eczema).

services.title: Ademhalingssysteem
services.description: Acute verkoudheid, griep, sinusitis, keelpijn, acute bronchitis, astma, allergieën.

services.title: Maag-darmstelsel
services.description: Slokdarmspasmen, gastritis, ontsteking van de dunne en dikke darm, prikkelbare darmsyndroom, obstipatie/diarree.

services.title: Spier- en Skeletstelsel
services.description: Sportblessures, whiplash, tenniselleboog, schouderpijn, rugpijn, zwakke/spastische verlamming, golfelleboog.

services.title: Hormonaal
services.description: Diabetes, menstruatiestoornissen, premenstruele pijn en spanning (PMS).

services.title: Urinaire en Voortplantingsorganen
services.description: Bedplassen, urineweginfecties, prostaathypertrofie/prostatitis, impotentie, erectieproblemen, brandende pijn tijdens het plassen, bepaalde vruchtbaarheidsproblemen.

services.title: Overige
services.description: Uitputting (mentaal en fysiek), Slaapstoornissen, psychische instabiliteit, depressie, nervositeit, fobieën, tandpijn, hoofdpijn, migraine, reumatische klachten, symptomen van de menopauze, gezichtspijn, fibromyalgie, RSI (herhaalde bewegingsletsel), burn-out, oorproblemen (zoals tinnitus), huidproblemen (bijvoorbeeld acne, eczeem).
